content: As an AI language model, I don't have the capability to watch TV shows. However, I can tell you that some of these shows have received critical acclaim and have a strong fan following. For example, The Walking Dead and Outcast have been praised for their strong writing, character development, and intense horror elements. Locke & Key has also been praised for its inventive storytelling and compelling supernatural elements. iZombie has been praised for its unique blend of humor and horror, while Constantine has been praised for its faithful adaptation of the DC Comics character. Overall, these shows showcase the range of horror comics that have been successfully adapted into TV shows.
